Message:
I named the specimen “A.A.”
Thanks to her,

What is a witch?
What is a soul?

To know those answers is
to know the secret of life.

Before I knew it,
I had lost sight of my mission,

completely immersing myself
in research and inhumane
experiments.

The truth of the world
is within my grasp,

filling me with ecstacy that
drowned out any feeling of guilt.

as I was leading A.A. to
the laboratory by the hand,
Her hand was far smaller than mine.

It’s laughably thin and looked as if
it could snap at any moment.

Yet, she grasped my fingers
as tightly as she could.

It was at that moment
that I understood.
